attributes.action: I want to see all Councils grow wildflowers on grass verges and on roundabouts.
attributes.additional_details: To help the environment issues and the decreasing bee & insect population. It’s a reasonably cheap thing to achieve and the Government could ask & encourage the councils to do this.
attributes.background:
Planting wildflowers not only looks attractive but it also help the environment and the wildlife.  Councils would save money not having to cut the grass verges & roundabouts for a while.
We need to help the Bees and other insects thrive because the world needs them.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Require local authorities replace roadside grass with wild flowers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616394

Fund the planting of wildflowers along all public green spaces: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607277
